Package controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initialisable
    public class Controller
extends Object
implements Initialisable
    The class Controller contains the parameters necessary for building a fractal. It is in charge of storing and providing fractal parameters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface interfaces.Initialisable

        Initialisable.ColorScheme, Initialisable.TypeFractal, Initialisable.TypeFunction
